text: SINGAPORE, Jan 12 UBS has hired Standard Chartered banker Axel Granger as its Southeast head of M&A and financial sponsors, two people with direct knowledge of the matter said on Tuesday.Singapore-based Granger will join UBS in March and report to Nicolo Magni, head of global banking for Southeast Asia and India, the people said.UBS confirmed the appointment.Granger has been a managing director at Standard Chartereds M&A division since 2017 and previously worked at investment bank Evercore, Bank of America and UBS. (Reporting by Anshuman Daga; Editing by Himani Sarkar)
